headline: JPMorgan Initiates Barrick Mining (B) at Overweight with $68 PT on Bullish Gold Outlook
summary: Barrick Mining Corporation (NYSE:B) is one of the most undervalued large cap stocks to invest in now. On January 29, JPMorgan initiated coverage of Barrick Mining with an Overweight rating and a $68 price target, underpinned by a bullish stance on gold driven by central bank demand and US policy uncertainty. The firm highlighted Barrick […]

headline: Trump Lawsuit And WealthOS Deal Shape JPMorgan Risk And Growth Story
summary: Former President Donald Trump has filed a $5b lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase, alleging politically motivated account closures. The case has intensified public debate about account closures, reputational risk, and so called debanking practices at large banks. Separately, JPMorgan Chase has agreed to acquire UK based pensions technology firm WealthOS, aiming to expand its retirement and pensions tech capabilities. JPMorgan Chase (NYSE: JPM) sits at the center of two very different headlines:...
